name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Vegetable Salad with Tarragon Mayo
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on salad. —Ed Levine...

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the mayo, yogurt, lemon juice, a lot of tarrgon, and salt and pepper.
Briefly steam broccoli, string beans, carrots; toss vegetables in dressing, along with the cherry tomatoes.
